author: Luke Reilly
title: Bad Boys for Life Will Arrive Early on Digital
description: Bad Boys for Life is joining the lengthy list of films getting an early digital release amid the COVID-19 crisis.
content: Will Smith and Martin Lawrences belated buddy cop blockbuster Bad Boys for Life is joining the lengthy list of films getting an early digital release amid the current COVID-19 coronavirus crisis, reports Variety.Bad Boys for Life will hit digital platforms on… [+1105 chars]
